description:
The Going Merry`s been stolen by Nami, and the showdown for possession of the Baratie is delayed. But the action`s not dead in the water - Zoro challenges Hawk-Eye Mihawk to a duel!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hawk-Eye Mihawk! The Great Swordsman Zoro Falls at Sea!
Mihawk, "l`Œil de Faucon" ! La défaite de Zoro, le légendaire manieur de sabre.
Taka no Me no Mihawk! Kengou Zoro Umi ni Chiru
Михок Ястребиные глаза! Мастер меча Зоро падает в море
عين الصّقر ميهوك! السّيّاف الّذي دفع زورو للإبحار
ตาเหยี่ยวมิฮอร์ค! นักดาบโซโลตกลงไปในทะเล!
鷹の目のミホーク! 剣豪ゾロ海に散る
